features: 【Perfect Match】Microwave Cover for Food & Multi-Purpose Mat 10"- Mat as Bowl Holder, Cover as Splatter Guard. Not only keep your microwave clean but also prevent burns. Microwave Mat allow you to fetch out food immediately after heating. No waiting, no burns.

【Multi-Purpose】Microwave cover not only avoid splattering, but also can be as washing basket for Vegetables and fruits. Multi-purpose mat can be as Trivet, Pot Holder, Spoon Rest, Utensils Rest, Place Mat, Hot Pad, Jar Opener, Coffee Coaster, Dish Drying Mat for Kitchen Counter,etc.

【Easy To Use And Storage】 Microwave Splatter Cover for Food Diameter is 10.5 inch. It fits most bowls and plates , The height of the food cover can be freely changed from 0.8 to 3.2 inch. It’s easily for storage.

【Perfect Design】Microwave Cover for Food is designed with vented holes on the top. it allows the airflow to circulate inside and outside. A handle was designed in the middle of the top for easy grabbing and avoid burns.

【Safety Material】Microwave cover for Food is made of PP plastic and mat is made of Food Grade silicone material. They are high temperature resistance and dishwasher safe. Warm Tip: Microwave Cover is not oven safe, but Microwave mat are both microwave and oven safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Best Match, Your Home Essentials Microwave Food Cover Color: Grey Cover Size: 10.5 inch Material: Plastic\ TPR Brand: Aidacom Packing List: 1X Microwave Cover 1X Microwave Mat Microwave Cover & Multi-Purpose Silicone Mat No Mess, No Waiting Microwave Cover for food & Multi-Purpose Mat- Mat as Bowl Holder, Cover for Splatter Guard, Not only keep your microwave clean but also can prevent burns. You can fetch out your food immediately from microwave oven after heating. No Waiting, No Burns. How Do You Use The Multi-Purpose Mat? Multi-purpose Mat can be as Microwave Hugger, Heat Resistant Trivet, Spoon Rest, Utensil Rest, Hot Pad, Pot Holder,Table Place Mat, Drying Mat, Jar Opener, Coffee Coaster, Placement for Kitchenware,etc. It's a helpful Kitchen gadget-Your Home Essentials.

Mat as Bowl Holder, Cover for Splatter Guard Why Need a Microwave Mat? Microwave Mat can not only keep your microwave clean but also prevent burns. You can use it to fetch out your food immediately from microwave oven after heating. No Waiting, No Burns. If you use the microwave cover only, the Microwave Glass Plate is always dirty and mess. Everything will be changed if you use the mat on the microwave glass plate. Aidacom microwave mat is designed a rasied edge for easy grabbing. Its deep grooves design is for distributing heat immediately, which allows you to fetch out the food immediately from microwave oven after Heating, Not too Hot, No need to Wait.

Multi-Purpose for the Microwave Mat The microwave Mat is a small Kitchen Gadget, But it is helpful. It not only can keep microwave clean and prevent burns, but also can be silicone trivets for hot dishes, pots and pans. You can use it as food cover in freezer. It can be as Dish Drying Mat, Utensils Rest, Baking Mat, Pot Holder, Table Place Mat, Jar Opener, Coffee Coaster, Splatter Guard, Hot Pad for Kitchen Counter, etc. The Multi-Purpose Mat is BPA Free, made of Food Grade Silicone, Support -40°F to 572°F (-40°C to 300°C). freezer, Microwave and Oven Safe.

Multi-Purpose Collapsible Microwave Cover Aidacom Collapsible Microwave Cover is not only designed to keep clean your microwave when heating food, but also can be as a colander for your kitchen. It also can be as a washing or storage basket for Vegetables and fruits. Microwave Cover Diameter is 10.5 inch. It fits most bowls and plates. The height of the food cover can be freely changed from 0.75” to 3.2”. It’s easy to Collapsible and storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits nicely over all my reheat meals and prevents spatters all over the microwave. Love the mat to hold the hot plate when removing as well as keeping the turntable clean. Very well made and a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for. The mat comes in way more handy than I thought it would. Both pieces easy to wash and holding up great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised/
reviews.reviewText: Works pretty good. A little hard to change the night.but works well when done. Love the mat. It is easily removed to clean and very helpful for overflows. Worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the product but it was too large

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We recently got a microwave for the basement. We often watch TV and have snacks and dinner while doing so. This cover works wonderful. Not one issue with it at all. Easy to use, helps keep the inside of the microwave clean. Have also used it while washing off fruit as well. Well worth the money.Tobey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The large cover size, both in diameter and depth, works with larger containers. Love the bonus base layer which works well as a jar opener besides protecting your hands from the hot bowl when removing from the microwave. Although a good storage feature, the collapsible aspect is not very useful as I often use the cover a few times a day and prefer to keep it open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Life-Changing Tool in a World of Darkness and Silence
reviews.reviewText: In a world bereft of sight, sound, taste, and touch, you find solace in the most unexpected places. For me, it's the Microwave Cover for Food & Multi-Purpose Mat. While I cannot perceive its physical form, the very presence of this item provides a comforting routine, a beacon of self-reliance in my otherwise challenging day-to-day life.This microwave cover and mat offer a semblance of control, a tiny but significant triumph in my navigation through a kitchen filled with dangers that I can't see, hear, or feel. This device serves as a protective guard, creating a barrier between my food and any unwanted splatters that could cause mess or potential harm.Without the sense of touch, retrieving heated food from a microwave can be a perilous journey fraught with uncertainty. This mat mitigates the danger, acting as a trustworthy shield and guide for the task. Even though I can't feel the heat, I am comforted knowing that it's there, doing its job of preventing possible burns.The product's multi-purpose nature is truly a blessing. It serves various roles - a washing basket for fruits and vegetables, a trivet, pot holder, and much more. It feels like having a silent ally in the kitchen, helping me handle tasks that may seem simple for others, but are monumental victories for me.One of the most essential features for me is the cover's design. It is created with vented holes on top, which, though I cannot feel, give me the confidence that the food is heated evenly without any buildup of steam or pressure. The handle in the middle reassures me that it can be safely removed without risk of accidental burns.The materials used in this product, PP plastic for the cover and food-grade silicone for the mat, add another level of reassurance. They are both resistant to high temperatures and safe to clean in a dishwasher - a welcome relief as I continuously strive to maintain cleanliness in a world I can't perceive.In my world of darkness, silence, and numbness, this Microwave Cover for Food & Multi-Purpose Mat is more than just a kitchen tool. It is a symbol of hope, independence, and resilience, proof that even amidst unimaginable challenges, there are tools out there that can help you maintain a semblance of normality. This product receives my highest recommendation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For the money this is a good product.
reviews.reviewText: It does what it says it will do and it is what it looks like so you get what you pay for.
